name: Trapped
description: Welcome to Estate deâ€™ Sukari. Home to Aki, a young lady who happens to live inside of the manor. She awakens one fateful evening to a horrific dream of her death. as she considers the possibility of sleep, a loud shriek fills the air leaving her with a question: Should she investigate or should she go back to bed?
